name: Reading Progress Bar
author: Anowar Hossain Rana

sections.description:
Reading Progress Color Bar plugin adds a stylish progress bar at the top of your browser window as users read through your pages or posts. The progress bar helps keep readers engaged by visually indicating how much of the content they have consumed. Customize the color of the progress bar through the plugin settings to seamlessly integrate it with your site’s design.

sections.installation:
1. Upload the reading-progress-bar folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to ‘Settings’ -> ‘Reading Progress Bar’ to customize the progress bar color.
sections.faq:
How do I change the color of the progress bar?

You can change the color of the progress bar by going to ‘Settings’ -> ‘Reading Progress Bar’ in the WordPress admin dashboard. Select your preferred color from the settings page.

Is this plugin compatible with my theme?

The Reading Progress Bar plugin is designed to be compatible with most WordPress themes. If you encounter any issues, please check the plugin settings or contact support.
